page.body:
Oliver Kendell
General Manager, Finance

Oliver joined Adams Supply & Services in 1999 and has played a vital role in improving and maintaining the financial standing of the company. He has been instrumental in determining the financial strategy and policy, arranging the appropriate funding, and managing financial risks in the organization.

Oliver is loyal, a rule follower, and gets lost in the details. He is motivated by praise and enjoys being in an isolated environment to get his work done. His actions are thoughtful and he prefers a conflict free workplace. Oliver is also driven by numbers with his favorite expression being “figures don’t lie but liars figure.”
